skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.
Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Although lacking the finesse of Elven magics, the sorceries of the north are no less potent, for they channel furious, Daemonic power.
Ancient runes writhe with power, amplifying Alfkaell's fury and unleashing devastation upon his foes.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10

skillTree.localised_description: Alfkaell bears the mark of the Khagan, a symbol of his status as a chosen vessel of Khorne's wrath.
he hunt calls to Alfkaell, guiding him unerringly to his prey with primal precision.
The fallen chant in the shadows, their whispers fueling Alfkaell's relentless advance.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for Marauder units
	(Hero's army)
Ability number of uses: +1 for "Gate of Khorne"
Ability number of uses: +2 for "Gate of Khorne"

skillTree.localised_description: Even in the face of insurmountable odds, Alfkaell stands unyielding, his resolve an unbreakable shield.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Haunting whispers surround Alfkaell, cursing his enemies and sowing seeds of despair in their hearts

effects.description: Attribute: "Immune to Psychology" for Marauder units

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: In the crimson haze of slaughter, Alfkaell discerns the hidden truths of battle, guiding his every strike.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Searing Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Searing Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Searing Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%

Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

items.colour_text: Nithi, the staff of Alfkaell, is a grim artifact dripping with the blood of countless victims. Crafted from the bones of fallen foes and imbued with Khorne's wrath, it thirsts eternally for battle. Each bone adorning its surface represents a life claimed in the name of the Blood God, empowering Alfkaell with relentless fury. Legends whisper of the staff's insatiable hunger, driving its wielder to ever greater acts of violence in Khorne's name.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Alfkaell, Bloodfather of the Aeslings, wields Khorne's fury, his visage draped in bearskin, eyes of sapphire, and a staff named "Nithi" adorned with victims' bones
